"Throw at the building where the man would stand"

...[indistinct] this does not say: "Throw the hand grenade where the representative would stand" but:  "Throw the hand grenade at the building where the man would stand" - you describe the building.

"I did in fact to what I was instructed to do, I threw the hand grenade towards the door at the Trust Bank building"

I just want to think about this very clearly.
